HTTP AniDB Metadata Agent (HAMA) was created by Atomicstrawberry (v0.1-0.4), is currently maintained by ZeroQI (v0.5+). HAMA uses the different databases and software below.
:
Uses most metadata and cover from AniDB:
"AniDB.net is non-profit database of anime information that is freely open to the public. As well as providing general anime information, if you sign up you can organise your anime collection, keep track of what you've seen and how much you liked it, and all kinds of nifty extras."
Uses pictures (Fanart, covers, banners) and episode summary (v0.5+) from TheTVDB:
"TheTVDB.com is a community driven database of television shows.
It is our aim to be the most complete and accurate source of
information on TV series from many languages and countries."
Uses files from XBMC plugin 'AniDB mod' (v0.5+):
"XBMC AniDB Mod is a XBMC metadata agent scrapper for AniDB.
The AniDB to TVDB XML mapping file (anime-list-master.xml), and Movie set collection file (anime-movieset-list.xml) are used with ScudLee authorisation and theire use and format explained here: Read Me"
Uses Absolute Series Scanner (ASS):
"ABsolute Series Scanner (ASS) is a scanner that uses absolute numbering like AniDB.
It support pretty much anything as long as you put series en theur own folder at root
